languages.text: {n}Голос техножреца внезапно становится сварлив.{/n} "Докладываю: текущее планетарное руководство также предположительно {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}скомпрометировано{/d}. Распоряжение о формировании "запретной лесной зоны Л-Тан" ограничивает возможности нашего братства к постижению и, предположительно, служит цели охранения обитающей в том регионе популяции ксеносуществ. Косвенные улики указывают на то, что высшие руководители колонии поддерживают контакт с данными ксеносуществами и, возможно, находятся под их контролем. Запрашиваю проведение расследования".

{n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос техножреца внезапно становится сварлив.{/n} "Докладываю: текущее планетарное руководство также предположительно {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}скомпрометировано{/d}. Распоряжение о формировании "запретной лесной зоны Л-Тан" ограничивает возможности нашего братства к постижению и, предположительно, служит цели охранения обитающей в том регионе популяции ксеносуществ. Косвенные улики указывают на то, что высшие руководители колонии поддерживают контакт с данными ксеносуществами и, возможно, находятся под их контролем. Запрашиваю проведение расследования".

traits.locale_text: {n}The tech-priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be compromised. The order to form the 'L-Tan Forbidden Forest Zone' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenos beings and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

{n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be compromised. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

{n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be compromised. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

{n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be compromised. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

languages.text: {n}技術司祭の声が突然不機嫌になる。{/n}「報告します。現在の惑星の指導部も{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}疑念{/d}の対象です。『L-Than森林地帯制限区域』を形成する命令は、我々の理解能力を制限し、おそらくは異種族の領域を保護する目的を果たしています。状況証拠から、コロニーの高官たちはこれらの異種族生物と連絡を取り、彼らの支配下にある可能性があります。調査を要求します」
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術司祭の声が突然不機嫌になる。{/n}「報告します。現在の惑星の指導部も{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}疑念{/d}の対象です。『L-Than森林地帯制限区域』を形成する命令は、我々の理解能力を制限し、おそらくは異種族の領域を保護する目的を果たしています。状況証拠から、コロニーの高官たちはこれらの異種族生物と連絡を取り、彼らの支配下にある可能性があります。調査を要求します」

languages.text: {n}La voix du technoprêtre se fait bougonne.{/n} « Rapport : les autorités planétaires actuelles sont également suspectées d'être {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromises{/d}. La création de la "zone forestière réglementée L-Than" limite notre capacité de compréhension et sert vraisemblablement à protéger une région de la population xénos. Des preuves indirectes suggèrent que certains dirigeants supérieurs de la colonie sont en contact avec ces xéno-créatures et qu'ils pourraient se trouver sous leur emprise. Je demande à ce qu'une enquête soit diligentée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix du technoprêtre se fait bougonne.{/n} « Rapport : les autorités planétaires actuelles sont également suspectées d'être compromises. La création de la "zone forestière réglementée L-Than" limite notre capacité de compréhension et sert vraisemblablement à protéger une région de la population xénos. Des preuves indirectes suggèrent que certains dirigeants supérieurs de la colonie sont en contact avec ces xéno-créatures et qu'ils pourraient se trouver sous leur emprise. Je sollicite la conduite d'une enquête. »

languages.text: {n}技术神甫的声音突然变得暴躁起来。{/n}“报告：目前，我们怀疑这颗行星的领导层遭到了{d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}渗透{/d}。构建‘莉莱赞森林禁区’的命令限制了我们的理解能力。据猜测，此命令的目的应该是为了保护该地区的异形生物。间接证据表明，殖民地的高层领袖与这些异形生物有接触，并可能受到了异形生物的控制。我希望能对此进行调查。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司的声音突然变得暴躁起来。{/n}“报告：目前，我们怀疑这颗行星的领导层遭到了渗透。构建‘莉莱赞森林禁区’的命令限制了我们的理解能力。据猜测，此命令的目的应该是为了保护该地区的异形生物。间接证据表明，殖民地的高层领袖与这些异形生物有接触，并可能受到了异形生物的控制。我希望能对此进行调查。”

languages.text: {n}La voz del tecnosacerdote se vuelve huraña.{/n} «Informando: se sospecha que el liderazgo actual del planeta se encuentra en {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}entredicho{/d}. La fundación del "área forestal restringida L-Than" limita nuestra capacidad de evaluación y presuntamente tiene por objetivo la protección de la región ante la población xenos. Las pruebas circunstanciales sugieren que los dirigentes más destacados de la colonia guardan contacto con dichas xenocriaturas y se encuentran doblegados a ellas. Solicito que se investigue este asunto».
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz del tecnosacerdote se vuelve huraña.{/n} «Informando: se sospecha que el liderazgo actual del planeta se encuentra en entredicho. La fundación del "área forestal restringida L-Than" limita nuestra capacidad de evaluación y presuntamente tiene por objetivo la protección de la región ante la población xenos. Las pruebas circunstanciales sugieren que los dirigentes más destacados de la colonia guardan contacto con dichas xenocriaturas y se encuentran doblegados a ellas. Solicito que se investigue este asunto».

languages.text: {n}Die Stimme des Techpriesters wird plötzlich grummelig.{/n} "Bericht: Die aktuelle Führung des Planeten ist vermutlich auch {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}kompromittiert{/d}. Der Befehl, das 'Beschränkte Waldgebiet L-Than' zu bilden, schränkt uns stark ein und dient wohl dazu, die Xenosbevölkerung der Region zu beschützen. Indizienbeweise legen nahe, dass die Anführer der Kolonie in Kontakt mit diesen Xenokreaturen stehen, möglicherweise sogar unter deren Kontrolle. Ich fordere eine Untersuchung."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Stimme des Techpriesters wird plötzlich grummelig.{/n} "Bericht: Die aktuelle Führung des Planeten ist vermutlich auch kompromittiert. Der Befehl, das 'Beschränkte Waldgebiet L-Than' zu bilden, schränkt uns stark ein und dient wohl dazu, die Xenosbevölkerung der Region zu beschützen. Indizienbeweise legen nahe, dass die Anführer der Kolonie in Kontakt mit diesen Xenokreaturen stehen, möglicherweise sogar unter deren Kontrolle. Ich fordere eine Untersuchung."

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in sesi aniden haşinleşiyor.{/n} "Rapor veriliyor: Gezegenin mevcut liderlik mertebelerinin de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}işlevsel bir şekilde çalışmadığından{/d} şüphe ediliyor. Bölgenin 'L-Than Yasaklı Orman Alanı' ilan edilişi, algı kapasitemizi sınırlıyor ve tahminî olarak zeno nüfusu bulunan bölgenin korunmasına hizmet ediyor. Dolaylı deliller, koloninin başlıca liderlerinin bu zenoyaratıklarla temas hâlinde olduğuna ve onların kontrolü altında olabileceklerine işaret ediyor. Bir inceleme talep etmekteyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The Tech-Priest's voice suddenly becomes grumpy.{/n} "Reporting: the current planetary leadership is also suspected to be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch2_JanusEldarGovern}compromised{/d}. The order to form the 'L-Than Restricted Forest Area' limits our ability to comprehend and presumably serves the purpose of protecting region of the xenos population. Circumstantial evidence indicates that senior leaders of the colony are in contact with these xenocreatures and may be under their control. I request an investigation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in sesi aniden haşinleşiyor.{/n} "Rapor veriliyor: Gezegenin mevcut liderlik mertebelerinin de işlevsel bir şekilde çalışmadığından şüphe ediliyor. Bölgenin 'L-Than Yasaklı Orman Alanı' ilan edilişi, algı kapasitemizi sınırlıyor ve tahminî olarak zeno nüfusu bulunan bölgenin korunmasına hizmet ediyor. Dolaylı deliller, koloninin başlıca liderlerinin bu zeno yaratıklarla temas hâlinde olduğuna ve onların kontrolü altında olabileceklerine işaret ediyor. Bir inceleme talep etmekteyim."
